name: Spiked
description:
Hi! This is our first entry to a game jam ever and so far it has been a very wonderful experience. For this game jam we have decided to challenge ourselves by combining a unique artstyle with the puzzle genre, and so Spiked was created. We hope you enjoy our little creation!

Credits

Made with ♥ by Arno & Wendy.

Made for NOKIA 3310 JAM 3
